description: Sean “Diddy” Combs confirmed at a hearing Thursday that he had rejected a plea deal from federal prosecutors in his sex trafficking case, paving the way for his trial to begin next week.
title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs confirms he rejected plea deal ahead of sex trafficking trial

description: Defense attorney Jennifer Bonjean, who is known for representing accused sex predators Bill Cosby and R. Kelly, grilled Miriam Haley about the jet-setting lifestyle that gave her access to celebrities like Weinstein when she took the stand for the third day.
title: Harvey Weinstein's lawyers try to poke holes in Miriam Haley's testimony during cross-examination

description: The anticipated rollout of updated Covid vaccines this fall might be at risk after a change by Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr.
title: Updated Covid vaccines for the fall may be in jeopardy under Kennedy's new rules

description: President Donald Trump could have booted national security adviser Mike Waltz from his post at any time since the Signalgate scandal broke in March.
title: Why Trump waited to make his move on Mike Waltz: From the Politics Desk

description: The Pittsburgh Pirates were left reeling by a fan's scary fall on to the playing surface at PNC Park, which quickly turned a moment of joy into “devastated” concern, veteran outfielder and team leader Andrew McCutchen said Thursday.
title: Pittsburgh Pirates 'devastated' by fan's fall during winning, late-inning rally

description: Collins, the chair of the Senate Appropriations Committee, said Trump should use a “surgical approach, not a sledgehammer” at the National Institutes of Health.
title: GOP Sen. Susan Collins urges Trump administration to reverse proposed medical research cuts

description: Police scoured the South Carolina beach town of Sullivan's Island, searching for a hit-and-run suspect who struck at least three pedestrians before fleeing on foot with a knife, police said.
title: Manhunt in South Carolina as police search for armed suspect who hit 2 kids, 1 adult with vehicle

description: Heidy Sánchez, who's married to a U.S. citizen who was trying to get her a green card, was detained and later deported after an ICE check-in.
title: Deported mom says she never had the option to take her 17-month-old daughter with her

description: Republicans are at loggerheads over the fate of a controversial tax deduction that is critical to winning enough votes in the House to pass Trump’s agenda.
title: Growing GOP fight over 'SALT' tax deduction complicates Trump agenda bill

description: The Trump administration’s promise to carry out the biggest deportation campaign in American history has a distinct and potent hallmark: speed.
title: Trump's deportation campaign is capitalizing on a key hallmark: Speed

description: The driver who crashed into an Illinois after-school program, killing four students, was not under the influence of alcohol and controlled substances.
title: Driver in Illinois after-school program crash that killed 4 was negative for alcohol, substances

description: Nvidia blasted Anthropic Thursday in a rare public clash over artificial intelligence policy with U.S. chip export restrictions set to take effect.
title: Nvidia says Anthropic is telling 'tall tale' in its defense of U.S. AI chip restrictions on China

description: The City of Chicago and former “Empire” actor Jussie Smollett have reached a settlement, six years after the city sued the TV star.
title: Jussie Smollett reaches settlement with city of Chicago 6 years after alleged hoax attack

description: A Soviet-era spacecraft meant to land on Venus in the 1970s is expected to soon plunge uncontrolled back to Earth.
title: Soviet-era spacecraft is set to plunge to Earth a half-century after its failed launch to Venus

description: Data center demand is not slowing down in the world’s largest market centered in northern Virginia, executives at Dominion Energy said Thursday.
title: Data center boom in world's largest market is not slowing down, Dominion Energy says

description: Tech is saving Hollywood — though not in the way you might think.
title: Amazon is stepping up to fill a gap in Hollywood's movie slate

description: House Republicans have a plan to drastically change how millions of Americans repay their student debt.
title: Here's what your monthly student loan bill could be under a new Republican plan

description: Gamers will have to shell out more money for Xbox consoles and controllers amid sweeping global tariffs that have caused prices to rise for American consumers.
title: Xbox raises prices on consoles, controllers, headsets due to 'market conditions'

description: Eleven upstate New York high school students have turned themselves in after an alleged hazing stunt on younger players on their lacrosse team.
title: 11 teen lacrosse players suspected in hazing incident surrender to police

description: DETROIT — General Motors on Thursday lowered its 2025 financial guidance to include an expected $4 billion to $5 billion impact as a result of President Donald Trump’s auto tariffs.
title: GM lowers 2025 guidance, citing up to $5 billion in tariff exposure

description: Authorities believe they have recovered the bodies of three girls who went missing after going on a fishing trip last month on the Missouri River in Omaha, Nebraska.
title: Bodies found in Missouri River believed to be girls who went missing while fishing in Omaha

description: The Westhill High School lacrosse coach in Syracuse where at least 11 players are accused of hazing younger members said he is heartbroken for the community and denies that the team's staff knew about the alleged incident before it happened.
title: Syracuse lacrosse team coach says staff had 'no prior knowledge' of alleged hazing

description: National security adviser Mike Waltz is expected to exit the Trump administration according to numerous media reports citing anonymous U.S. officials. Waltz came under fire after a journalist was mistakenly added to a group chat with other top officials about U.S. military plans with Yemen.
title: National security adviser Mike Watlz expected to exit Trump administration

description: LeBron James wasn’t ready to make any decisions about his future in the painful moments immediately after his 22nd NBA season ended with the Los Angeles Lakers’ first-round playoff exit.
title: LeBron James doesn't want to answer questions about his future after Lakers' playoff exit

description: Boy band veteran Justin Timberlake brought his choreography skills to the golf course with Kansas City Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce and comedian Andrew Santino, in a video posted to Instagram on Wednesday.
title: Video shows Justin Timberlake becoming Travis Kelce's 'backup dancer' on the golf course

description: New research shows that the 15-year-old California sea lion can follow changes in rhythm with surprising precision.
title: Ronan the sea lion can keep a beat better than humans

description: If the next pope is from sub-Saharan Africa, he would be the first in Catholic Church history.
title: Africans say a Black pope would be nice to have, but they are not too hopeful

description: An astronaut who missed out on the first all-female spacewalk because of a spacesuit sizing issue gets her chance six years later.
title: NASA astronauts step outside space station to perform the 5th all-female spacewalk

description: Watch live coverage as President Trump participates in a National Day of Prayer event at the White House.
title: Trump holds National Day of Prayer event at White House

description: Iran accused the U.S, of “contradictory behavior and provocative statements” after Washington warned Tehran of consequences for backing Yemen’s Houthis.
title: Iran accuses U.S. of 'provocative statements' ahead of nuclear talks

description: Shares of Tesla were flat in premarket trading Thursday after the EV maker denied a Wall Street Journal report that its board was searching for a replacement for chief executive Elon Musk.
title: Tesla denies report that the EV maker is looking to replace Elon Musk

description: Days earlier, Venezuelan detainees at the center were given notices by immigration officials that alleged they were Tren de Aragua members and subject to deportation under a wartime law,
title: SOS: Migrants held in Texas fear notorious El Salvador prison

description: A woman has sued American Airlines, claiming she was sexually assaulted on a domestic flight last year by a man previously reported to the airline for sexual abuse allegations.
title: Woman sues American Airlines claiming she was sexually assaulted mid-flight by man once accused of similar abuse

description: McDonald's reported its worst quarterly sales for the United States since the height of the pandemic in 2020, the latest restaurant chain to be impacted by America's turbulent economic environment.
title: McDonald's sees biggest U.S. sales decline since 2020: 'People are just visiting less'

description: MEMPHIS, Tenn. — A cybercrime expert with the Tennessee Bureau of Investigation testified Wednesday that a former Memphis police officer charged in the fatal beating of Tyre Nichols took a cellphone photo of Nichols as he struggled with serious injuries.
title: Ex-Memphis officer took photo of Tyre Nichols after fatal beating and shared it, investigator says

description: STARKE, Fla. (AP) — An Army combat veteran whose Gulf War experience triggered severe mental problems is scheduled to be executed Thursday in Florida for the shotgun killings of his girlfriend and her three young children in 1998.
title: Army veteran convicted of killing girlfriend and her 3 children set to be executed in Florida

description: U.S. and Ukraine sign minerals deal. U.S. Economy shrinks amid tariffs fears. International students on visas targeted. Can 100 men fight a gorilla?
title: U.S.-Ukraine minerals deal and GDP declines amid tariff fears: Morning Rundown

description: Australian locals rescued a 10-foot great white shark that was stranded on a sand bank, pushing it into deeper water.
title: Australian locals rescue great white shark stranded in shallow water

description: South Korea’s Supreme Court overturned an earlier ruling that had cleared election frontrunner Lee Jae-myung of election law violation, throwing into doubt his eligibility to run for the presidency.
title: South Korea's top court rules against  presidential frontrunner, potentially upending election

description: Betting the Kentucky Derby? Here are our tips and best bets for Saturday's big horse race.
title: New to betting horse racing? Here's our tips ahead of the Kentucky Derby

description: Top Army officials are proposing to eliminate Humvees and cut other costs in the hope it will allow generals, not DOGE, to decide where and how to cut spending.
title: Army leaders to Musk: We will DOGE ourselves

description: Elon Musk said Wednesday that he’s in the process of stepping back from his nearly 24/7 role with the Department of Government Efficiency to focus on his businesses.
title: No more sleepovers and late-night ice cream: Elon Musk prepares his White House exit

description: A cheeky claim made by an X user has quickly turned into a lively debate online: Could 100 unarmed men take on a single gorilla?
title: The internet is brawling over whether 100 men could fight a gorilla

description: President Donald Trump’s massive China tariffs are jeopardizing American fireworks shows, threatening to drive up prices and limit supplies.
title: Trump's 'Liberation Day' tariffs are threatening Independence Day fireworks

description: NEW YORK — Martin Scorsese is a producing a documentary made with Pope Francis that will chronicle the late pontiff’s work with cinema in the global educational movement he founded before his death.
title: Martin Scorsese and Pope Francis teamed to produce a documentary called 'Aldeas — A New Story'

description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio urged India and Pakistan to work with each other to de-escalate tensions after last week’s Islamist militant attack in India-administered Kashmir.
title: U.S. urges India and Pakistan to work with each other to reduce tensions

description: Los Angeles prosecutors Wednesday did not file any charges against the wife of a Weezer band member during her initial court appearance in downtown Los Angeles.
title: Author and wife of Weezer bassist appears in court with charges yet to be filed

description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent praised a deal with Ukraine that will give the U.S. preferential access to Ukrainian minerals deals and fund Ukraine’s recovery. Bessent called it a "historic economic partnership" and said that the U.S. "looks forward to quickly operationalizing" the agreement.
title: Treasury Sec. Bessent praises U.S.-Ukraine deal

description: NBC News' Gadi Schwartz talks to Dr. Tara Stoinski, who has more than 20 years of experience studying and researching gorillas, about who she thinks would win the viral man vs gorilla debate and what science has to say about it.
title: Scientist settles the viral '100 men vs gorilla' debate

description: A man was in critical condition after he plunged around 20 feet from the stands to the ground at a Pittsburgh Pirates home game at PNC Park on Wednesday, officials said.
title: Man plunges from the stands at Pittsburgh Pirates game
